channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Making A Scene
channel.desc: Explores the island of Haida Gwaii, home to one of the most unique music scenes in all of Canada. Whether it?s jamming in a secluded cabin or organizing local music carnivals, this island is all about honouring their culture, building community and ? most of all ? having fun. (R).
